column5: Yes $14.95 instead of $24.95 but the CTC here never carries bigger than 20lb test.
Good thing the stuff is garbage. lol.  I wouldn't pay that when Power pro is 3 bucks more. I got the new power pro on my new reel and its awesome.
BPS has the Suffix 832 on sale @ 20% off, time to stock up
Suffix 832 really is the way to go, I was really impressed with it last year and I have used all three extensively.
The new Power Pro slick  is way better.
Thanks for the heads up anyway, Darsky. Most of us appreciate it.
832 is awesome if you want to tip wrap like crazy!  Definitely not a line you want to fish topwaters with!
Thanks for the heads up...I just went and cleaned my store out of 6lb.

I don't need any more Fireline.  Still using the first spool I ever bought when it first came out over 10 years ago.  I have bought other spools since then too.  The ice fishing stuff.....there was nothing that I needed.  I was hoping that the Rapala jigging minnows were on sale.  However, the store I went to also had a big bin full of lures on liquidation.  I bought a 14 cm Huskey Jerk in silver, blue with orange belly for 6 dollars and a 11 cm Rapala Deep Tail Dancer in a similar colour for 7.99

I just picked up a spool of the Fireline Tracer braid, 40 pound test. Always willing to try something different, looks funky and for 14 bucks why not? I checked, the 65 pound Tracer was still regular price.
I picked up a spool of 20 # test in green. Do you notice there is just a tad bit of memory on it?
I guess the bait casters and other reels weren't on sale yet?.
Burlington store has a selection for 40% off.  Have rod bags, rods, scoops, tip ups, lots of augers ect.  Picked up a few things today.
